title: White Label
lede: Customize the platform branding and appearance to match your company's identity.

sections.title: Branding Customization
sections.content:
Customize the platform appearance with your company's branding elements.

Branding Options:

  • Company Logo: Upload your logo for dashboard and emails
  • Color Scheme: Customize primary and secondary colors
  • Custom Domain: Use your own domain for the platform
  • Favicon: Set custom browser tab icon

sections.title: White Label Features
sections.content:
Advanced white-labeling options for reseller and enterprise accounts.

  • Custom Footer: Add your company information to emails
  • Brand Removal: Remove iMash branding from interface
  • Custom URLs: Use branded URLs for customer-facing pages
  • Email Templates: Customize email templates with your branding

metaTitle: White Label - Custom Branding Options | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Configure white-label settings for custom branding. Add your logo, colors, and domain for branded experience.
metaKeywords: white label, custom branding, private label, branded platform, custom domain, logo customization
